TestDescription.name: Nginx memory disclosure with specially crafted HTTP backend responses
TestDescription.Description: There is a use-after-free vulnerability in nginx before 1.0.14 and 1.1.x before 1.1.17 allows remote HTTP servers to obtain sensitive information from process memory via a crafted backend response, in conjunction with a client request.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker could obtain sensitive information for the process memory.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of nginx.
